Blog.post: urlLink Hehe. The one in, erm, purple is my Nanny... Standing beside is Sis Ah Mueh (^_^) The one in yellow ma, is my Sista! and I am in PINK...
urlLink :D nuff said, too
urlLink :D nuff said!
urlLink All Chinese Girls from Form 5 Intan in SMK Sri Perhentian, Pontian Johor... My, I miss SSP
urlLink Majlis Pecah Tanah - Ground breaking Ceremony for my College. This is where the permanent campus would be... These are my friends from College
urlLink Hahahaa! I simply love this pic. This is the picture of the whole family of Room 57-1 in KUTKM. Only 2 chinese in that dorm, but somehow, Sarah and I manage to live through it
urlLink Ok, my form 6 picture... Erm, nothing much about it... Guess I dun wanna have any recollection abt what happened in Form6 gua...
urlLink My nephew Keagen (did I spell correct??) and my third aunt Lily. Very 'ang kong kong' coz of Chinese New Year!
urlLink Hmm, this my Cousin Wilson... I think he's pretty handsome! Hahaha... and my baby cousin Hugo...
urlLink This all-girls cousin pic was taken during my grandma's birthday celebration... Well, I just don't know what's Uncle Eric doing behind! *No offence ya, Uncle*
urlLink My ma used to cut my hair short, but I'd love to have long hair... So I put the skirt on my head and pretended to have long hair... sigh!
urlLink This was taken when I was one year old. My Ma told me that the photographer had a hard time taking my picture coz I was basically crying all the while! No wonder I looked so glum...
urlLink I was pretty active when I was still a baby, and my dad found it's a nuisance to take care of me, so he just chuck me into this tub so that I can't climb out
urlLink haha, crawlie crawlie

finally got my PC back home and online... but NO ONE IS ONLINE! damn sien lerr! but luckily i can multitask now, i can on my ICQ and my gal fren Kit is there! oh Thank God! Listening to online radio (Yahoo! LauchCast - Chill Out) and thank God for the 56Kbps dial up connection, the song like broken broken. Went to melaka to bring this PC back... nothing much in melaka, still as dead as ever! :O Malaccans, no offence ya! Hahaha... p.s. to Darling:: Yeah! chill out is sucha great channel.

going to melaka to take my PC. finally!!! been online with this old P2 laptop and it's driving me nuts. man this is slow. not saying my PC is very fast but definately faster than this... haha. anyway, at least i can multitasks with my own PC. like here, i cant log into my ICQ. if i wanna use YM, it's only YM, if i wanna browse the web, it's only IE! 2 or more program will make this old laptop commit suicide man...

hmm, nothing much, juz trying out my first blog. jz finish bullshitting with my bf's fren (darling, u know who la)... saying my bf got da whole bus load of ex-gfs... so funny! having my holidays now staying at home. this means i aint gonna meet my darling for like wat, 3 weeks. man, pls pray i can go thru this... duno what to write, nothing happen, jz IM and IM and IM the whole day... sigh! darling, where r u now?

the same guy who told me abt my bf one now wants to make poem. coz i told him about this blog im creating. so we had a lil' poem creation. the rule is that he starts the poem and i gotta continue. so the end product goes like this kimleong :: good days never come as good night has passed~ me :: in agony i am, happiness wont last kimleong :: but in god we trusted how come life still sucks! me :: dreams are shattered and faiths begin to crush hahahaha.... *cheers* to leong!

haha... i was reading my best fren's blog and i find this topic rather interesting. she got this habit of like diggin holes off her lips. something like peelin off the skin of her lips till like it bleeds. so i jz wonder, birds of a kind flock together huh?! coz i myself have this one peculiar habit too. i dun peel skin off my lips, but i peel skin off my fingers. jz at the cuticles... i dun like the hard dry feelin of my cuticle skin so, i'll jz by hook or by crook peel it off until it bleeds. and only when i see it bleed, i'd stop. tho i actually feel bad abt the bleeding, it doesnt really stop me from doin it when the wound heals. it's pretty disgusting sight actually, especially after bath and it got contact with water, the skin is like wrinkled. man, that's ugly... usually, i start peelin skin of my cuticles when i feel stressed up, or extremely bored. haha... i think peelin of those skin take me away from my problems for a while and keeping me busy when i have nothing to do. i often get nagged by my darlin, but i think that's the only thing i nv listen to him, coz i basically continue doin so after all the reprimand... hahaha... unlike my fren she love doin so, i dun wanna do it, but it's really hard to control myself...
my darling...

27th JUNE 2004 I wasnt in melaka for his birthday, so i was unable to post a birthday greeting for him... so... here's it! hehe.. my darling's birthday was on Sunday 27th June... i actually went to celebrate with him. but, then, not much activities to do also. tot of cookin some mee suah + egg (the chinese belive, eating mee suah neng for birthday will have long life after this.. haha) for him, but he got no gas stove in his house. to be exact, got stove, but no gasoline. i ended up cooking maggi mee for him, using rice cooker... ok la... noodle also ma. wat more, i cook one lerrrrrr! hahahahhaha... well, the nite before, we went for a movie. "The Day After Tomorrow". Nice show... wonderful effect... the snow looks so real. my fav effect is actually the begining part when it introduce the actors and directors credit, the name was like flyin over some water and casted some reflection on the water... pretty cool and i really appreciated it for those detailing stuffs... hmm... i'll keep the other details in my heart... coz, i duno how to write it out here anyway... FOr MorE InFORmation, please call... hahahahaa....

damn, I was stuck in Cubic for 1 whole damn hour... Cubic is the "Creative Tech" factory (ya, the sound card thingy) in Melaka.. which is like hmm, think few minutes (fast bus) away from the main Taman . my class which was supposed to end at 4, ended at 3.30. *yippie* .. ok, then my frens and i went to wait for the buses la, the weather's bad here, with all those dust and all. so the waiting isnt at all fun. so we waited and waited... 0.5hr passed... the bus isnt here yet... and it;s already 4pm then, so we were jz wondering, KUTKM din arrange any classes at 4pm in Cubic meh ? haha, nvm, we carried on waiting but not even a single souled buses arrive, I so wanna cry taht time...the bus didnt arrive until 4.30... can u believe it... man how i hate this place! ok, when one bus arrived, comes also another 4... so taht didnt help much either... damn KU!

hi people, im currently in melaka. o some place where i name it HELL. well, school started here... first class today morning at 9... went with "duno what's happening" feeling the whole day. first lesson by prof mokhtar on monday 9am isnt really something very encouraging. damn, he's a good lecturer, rather somewhat too good taht i couldnt even understand a thingy he's teaching. ok, so this sem he's going to teach us something of "Strategic Information System Planning"... sounds cool, does it?! neigh! it's damn boring theoretical stuffs. and i HATE this kinda subject. so, as usual, im staring at him the whole session with my mind wondering to my bf... his birthday is coming soon and i duno what to get for him. *heeeeelp* ok, back to the lesson... and after the class, prof told us that next week would be some presentation for individual assignment, and as he was calling out the names, i was telling kit (my gal fren sat next to me) taht we (she n i) wont b so "lucky" ba coz the gal sitting rite in front of me jz got called and tot that we might be spared! ahhaha! then God was so kind and allowed my name to be called by prof!!!! damn, i tot of skipping class next week and now my plans are all crushed. *sob sob sob sob sob* the only consolation i got today is that i get to have my network at my house in melaka set up. at least now im connected still to the world...

somebody help! it's 1.40 in the morning and i cant get to sleep! i put the blame on the 2 cuppa caffeine after dinner... hmm... ok... i went to the nite market ( pasar malam ) in my hometown, Pontian, on friday... hadnt been there for a long time... lemme count... i think, it can be easily more than 8 months. it was kinda nostalgia, ya know. I used to be like, going there almost everyweek when i was still studyin in my secondary school yrs, and now, only get to go like once in 8 months. ha, so the moment i reach there, a lot of memories jz started playing in my mind. as i walk along the throng of ppl, sigh, i think abt how my ma and i used to squeeze among these ppl to get thru... haha... hmm, went to buy my favourite tau hue (jelly bean) and tau hue jui (soya bean water)... then went to by some chinese kueh of kueh lapis (multilayered kueh ) and ku chai kueh ... and my! they were delicious and is delicious still... oh ya! and tehre was this keropok lekor also, which is my ma all time favourite... After spending sucha long time in KL and in Melaka, I jz want to devour everything in the nite market. haha... when i told my darling abt it, he actually had to remind me of my "diet plan"... hahaha! ya ya, i do have a diet plan, but heck care on that day! hahaha...

blogging is to tell ppl what u have been up to in ur life... what are the things u have done in a day o so...BUT, wat if, u havent been doin things and juz bumming around all day?? how shall i blog on that???? sigh! been doing nothing for so long, i begin to feel somewhat guilty about not startin to work on my final project. but then again, IT IS DAMN BORING STUFF! i jz hope taht by the time school reopens, i can get back a lil' bit of fighting spirit for the last lap of my life in KUTKM...

it looks like i've been neglecting my blog these couple of days. darn. nothing happened, so nothing to write... jz online chat and chat and chat. juz dun have the heart to start my Final Project. I think Goh's gonna have a heart attack soon for having me as one of his supervised! hahahaah! somebody save me please.
im in singapore now. duno gonna do what tomorrow. it's a public holiday here, so my ma said wanna come and visit my sis while she shop her time (and $$$$$) away... sigh!

hiya people. Guess wat? say HI to JUNE! it's the month of June d... Soon 2004 will be left half of it only. So, hmm, going to start this month by... Poetry challenge again! hahaa... since that leong got so many "inks" in the brain, would be wasted if left unused :D but i think it's rather dark kinda poem LeongLeong: my head is light, feels like going to die June: my heart is failing, feels like im falling LeongLeong: head and heart are irritating my mind June: wounds and cuts decorated my soul LeongLeong: for the deep one ruined my body June: no hope, no chance of recovery LeongLeong: just lying on the floor , resting in peace June: no escape, no aid, no way to flee LeongLeong: please let me breathe! let me live! let me tear off ur face! June: since u cut, and u break, injuring my faith

24th July: Leong leong ... 26th July: ah Kit wish you both "year year got today, age age got this zao1 (i duno how to translate zao1, bt sure ya guys wont mind de rite)!" A big hug and muak muak to da both of you! Have a nice year ahead!

kels was correct. editing pics can b a pain in the a** man! sigh! gotta auto level it, change the image size, blur here and there to remove the 'imperfections' (which can be a lot for me!)... any how, i still like upload these latest pics, else why i want my blog and photoblog for isnt it?!
urlLink in front of KLCC ....
urlLink first pic together after half a year. this was taken in gloria jeans last week...

urlLink fun fun fun... this was taken last nite in our PROM. o we called it the "Pioneer Farewell Night". We are the pioneer batch from KUTKM and we never had a party like this b4... we had 2 princesses that night. One is our Japanese Princess, Jessy (standing beside Licheng) and another one is Honey (the one in front with pink dress). Honey wore that pink dress with lil polkadot and ribbon. man, taht was sooooo cute... and she's fair enough that the dress suits her well. in the pics also beeping, meiyin, hueisei and myself. :D
urlLink Huei Sei, Beeping and myself! oh! haha... Bee Ping won the most welcomed female for that night.. zui2 shou4 huan1 ying2 jiang3... cool eh! she's so pretty that nite. so unexpected man!

urlLink Awww! Who can forget about Sarah!?! She was my bedmate for 2 sems! haha! u see, when we were in hostel still, we sleep in bunk bed. so, the bunk is our bed :D therefore we're bedmate! she took the upper bunk while im in the lower. I mean, luckily college arranged that way. from the pic u know how big size i am, so if i were to sleep in the upper bunk, it'd be very very very not stable! coz the duno what pusat graviti thingy la :D

urlLink Hahaha, this part was really fun. Okay, our DJ aired the song "Get Busy" by Sean Paul. So u know people, licheng and i basically loved this song. coz ya getta shake ur bon bon with it. So the both of us got really wild dancing away with this song. OMG, i kinda forgot that it was a school event and was like imagining i was in a club partyin away...

urlLink This is me and meiyin. Haha... it's a must to take pics with meiyin lerr... She was my partner during industrial training. So of coz mus take pics with her. Oh btw, her camera was of the same model as mine. So during the dinner, we always nearly like mistakenly took each other's cam. haha...
urlLink this is me, with Kit on the left and Pei Ting on the right. Know what, i had a hard time coaxing Kit to wear her skirt as tube...
urlLink huei sei and i
urlLink housemates... during prom while makan. The Prom was held in Hotel Aldy. Cool place. It was like a rooftop party, something different huh... the food was not bad :D slurp! im hungry now
urlLink ME !!!! nuff said :D
urlLink my housemate, Khee Hui. The only white from our house! hahaha, I mean, most of us wore black that day and she's the only one in white.
urlLink my roommate, Li Cheng.
urlLink Hehe, this is my next-room-door housemate, Huei Sei. Taken after i went out with Yew Loon's car.

urlLink this is of coz, our kitchen... no table, not chair, jz a sink. then, (paiseh ya! duno who brought the stove) ok, the stove's there. bt no table to put on... any donations?!?! then when we wanna cook we gotta squat down... so, any dontations??

urlLink this is the middle of the house... well, u get out from the hall one exit is to downstair another to sansan&kheehui's room and the 3rd one is to here. to the left will be my room and hueisei's. I share a room with licheng :D

urlLink this is where i stay now in melaka. im stayin at the upper level of those shop houses in taman tasik utama. this is the hall, and my desktop... 3 of us had our things in the hall... well, must fully utilize ma!
why?!?!?! why?!?!?! why?!?!?!? why didnt i check my mail on Saturday?!?!?! why?!?!?! then at least i can come back only tmr....

urlLink here's another one... LeongLeong on the left and MingMing on the right. Ming's my darlin's housemate... Funny guy :D oh ya! forgot to mention something earlier... Classified for Leong :: Can contact LeongLeong at photosnaper@yahoo.com (YM:: photosnaper)... Hmm... Be serios ok GALS (Look, GALS only)... those who wanna play play one, please stay away ya!

urlLink this is my darlin's fren, LeongLeong. For those who read my blog earlier would know that he's the one playin the poetry thingy with me. Ha, i took a long time to persuad him to gimme his pic so i can post online... haha. I think he's sucha sport! Damn steady man! Cool Leong! that's his dog, Mario, when Mario's still a baby. So cute...

urlLink aiyak forgot to mention jz now the pic of 4 of us was taken by Hock Kee, the only male in our group... ok ok, now the full group for Albert's project is this.. oh!!! hock kee wasnt in albert's class this morning!!! he, he he... ponteng!!! ahahahahahah

urlLink ha, this pic was taken yesterday. (from left: Me, Yen Wei, Kit and Lilian)... look how selekeh i am! hahaha, these are my group members for Albert's (entrepreneurship skill lecture) class project. this is the first time after 4 yrs i take picture for doin group project... haha. anyway, coz yesterday was Lilian's birthday, that's why she got the cam with her. so anyway, HAPPY BIRTHDAY (belated) to LILIAN ...

sigh! today is the 1st of July... damn, it marks the end of my month... and half of 2004 is gone. i think i pretty went thru the first half of 2004 kinda fast and smooth and happy (thanks to my pa n ma, my darling n his frens for the time i was in KL, my training company, my sis who let me escape to singapore once in a while... haha like gettin an Oscar!)... but after my school reopened on the 21st of june, i think, these 2 weeks passed by like damn slow like a tortoise. damn it. damn it... i cant wait to go home.... :(

That's the address to TwelveSI... urlLink haRR! today i received a letter from 12SI, some chained club in Klang Valley. Know what, the letter was sent in red envelop and I got the shock of my life, thinking, OMG, who's getting married?!?!?!? hahaha, well, most of my best gal frens are attached mah ;) anyway, the thing i received is about 12SI 2nd Anniversary promotions erm, erm, offer cards?! no way, it's only like the map/floorplan of their club premise... u see, the map is printed on 8 cards and ya gotta join em up to get da whole map, somethin like a puzzle. a cute way of promoting isnt it?! there's like DJs performing on the 18th and 20th of Aug. Funk D'Void from Scotland will be in da house on the 18th and John Creamer on the 20th. I dunno who are they anyway, i jz type it out from da promotion cards :D Too bad kel isnt here, else we can go partay ya! ehhehe... i tot of asking LeongLeong to belanja minum in 12SI, since i got the ladies' card (entitled to 15% on all bottle puchase worrr, Leong!) and there's like events going on, but they (LeongLeong+gang) are lazy to shake their bon bon, and since most of the events are in atmosphere-the club, all da more they dun wanna go. I think i'd love to explore bliss-the lounge more, anyway... oh you see, 12SI consist of atmos-the club, bliss-the lounge, barfly-the bar and gerai-the cafe. some sorta "bao ka liou" kinda club which like cater to all sortsa ppl around. oh what's da different between da lounge and da bar?! can someone tell me?!

urlLink MW stands for Mourning Widows. One of my fav group! Set up by Nuno Bettencourt bt was disbanded. Da image is taken from the 2nd album of MW... Nuno is so sexy and has great hair... ok, these are all irrelavant! i jz upload this pic coz my darling wanna use it as avatar and need a link or something! but anyway, urlLink http://www.population-1.com ... have a look! ;D
im listening to some jazz in my room.... in d dark, with only a orange light from IKEA... and... i miss my darling....

This is the title of the show i was watching earlier. 2 women were sent to LA for like some makeovers to like cut and sew away those parts they hated. the results after 8 weeks were awesome man! i now pledge on believing the power of plastic surgury and cosmetics man! then i was thinking to myself, if i were to have a extreme makeover as well, what would i change?!... hmm... my past... i duno why, this thought jz came into my mind. the only thing i want to change in my life is my past. well, not to say that i have a bad past, but still i think it could have been better. i could have done better in STPM and went into like more prestigous Uni, I could have done this, i could have done that... sigh... i know there's like no turning back, but ... but... but... what the hell im talking about here.... urgh! maybe it's time to get some sleep!

erm, seriusly, I dun think that's a good idea! *hardware = barangkeras *software = baranglembut *joystick = batang gembira *plug and play = cucuk dan main *port = lubang *server = pelayan *client = pelanggan Try translating this: ENGLISH : That server gives a plug and play service to the clients using either hardware or software joystick.The joystick goes into the port of the client." BAHASA : Pelayan itu memberi pelanggannya layanan cucuk dan main dengan menggunakan batang gembira jenis keras atau lembut.Batang gembira itu dimasukkan ke dalam lubang pelanggan."

yeah kel, i think i should update my blog more often!! lemme see.... ok, Happy National Day Singaporeans! and Happy Birthday to my roomie, Cindy baby! Joining club 23 today man! haha... Hey kel, soon will b your turn huh! ;-) been sleeping like mad since i got home. i jz sleep like i had nv slept before. hohohohohoh... think those late nites in melaka really like makes me weak man! wat ta do?! my darling is a nite bird, and i miss him :"> so much worrr! hahahaa... oh kel, wanna mention again that getting to "snuggle" into ya loved one is not hiao man... i really think it's the coolest thingy! (psst to hong dear: right, darling?!) mayb i should start to work now... get on with my project! but u know what?! i left my content CD in melaka!!!!! ARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR! damn! mayb i should go watch da TV. "Teen Awards" going on now!

Oops. i think i neglected my blog again! im sorry my pals, jz been busy previuosly... u know, exams and assignments... damn bored man! anyway, im havin my mid semester break now, for 1 week (thank God so much!)... and im currently at home. brought home my PC as well, so tht i can so my assignments and projects at home (or, at least taht i planned to do), but most likely i'd be online surfing for i dunno what, and watching TV most of the time at home! what else! sleep!!! i'd love lotsa lotsa sleeep man! hahaa... wat to do... my bed is jz behind me!!! hahaa... anyway. i still have one week at home.. let see what can i cook up each day! anyway, to friends of KUTKM... HAppyY HoliDayS! and enjoy!
